section.name: How can I contact the authors
section.p: You can contact the authors of Aozan by mail or using the aozan group on the Google group.

section.name: How can I contribute to Aozan
section.p: Aozan is a free software project. Everybody is encouraged to contribute to Aozan. You can help continuing Aozan in many ways such as:

ul.li: Submitting bug reports to the issue tracker
Writing developer documentation on Aozan Wiki if you become an Aozan committer

section.p: There are several places to look for more information if you want to get involved in the development. The first step is to subscribe to the aozan group. You will certainly see something that can be improved or added quickly.

section.name: How do I commit a bug report?
section.p: As Aozan code is hosted by GitHub, you can use the issue tracker bound to our project.

section.name: How do I get access to the code repository ?
section.p: The Aozan project uses the Git system to develop the core parts of the software. To ease the contributions to our project, Aozan code is hosted by GitHub. Feel free to go to the main page of the project and to the git repository.
